TableSpec.Name: Deleted MIMED Contacts and Friend (shell) records
TableSpec.Description: Records the statistics of the deletion of matched MIMED Contact and Friend (shell) records
TableSpec.Author: UM Dev

NumberField.Description: Count of MIMED Friend (shell) records that were deleted
NumberField.Name: MIMEDFRIENDRECORDS

NumberField.Description: Count of MIMED Contact records that were deleted who were linked to DART constituents
NumberField.Name: MIMEDUMHSDATARECORDS

ComputedColumnField.Name: STATUS
ComputedColumnField.Expression: CASE WHEN NULLIF(ISNULL(MESSAGE, N''), N'') IS NULL THEN N'Success' ELSE N'Error' END
